text: 1.20-21 Apo 1.16, 3.18, Lom 12.6, 2 Ti 3.16, 1 Pi 1.11 Nɨgɨm. Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok, kɨli buk Baybol takaw ak mɨj tɨkɨnɨg, bɨ olap gos ne nɨgak akaŋ gos kɨli ke nɨgɨlak tek tɨkɨl ma agɨlak. Mel. God Kawnan ne ak kɨlop kod mɨdɨlɨg gos ñaknɨŋ, anɨb ak nep God takaw ne nep tɨkɨl agɨlak. Anɨb ak tek takaw nokom olap nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok, God kɨlop gos ñek takaw ne ak nep tɨkɨlak. Gos kɨli ke nɨŋɨd tɨg asɨkɨl ma tɨkɨlak.
